text: Giwi Margwelaschwili (; December 14, 1927 â€“ 13 March 2020) was a German- Georgian writer and philosopher. He was born in Berlin. The University of Bamberg appointed him professor for poetry.Giwi Margwelaschwili . International Literature Festival, Berlin.
